column4: I'll try this one more time... I know this is not a specific question about ubuntu but I've searched everywhere and nobody can seem to answer my question, maybe someone here can!  I am currently having  a problem with OOwriter I merged a letter with OOCalc database and the resulting merge looks fine, but for some reason is automatically placing a blank page between every page.  Does anyone know where to turn off this function that automatically adds bla
:( i would give it a shot, but i dont use openoffice...or any doc editor (cept for office @ work)
